description: The user asks EcoReportAI to verify the latest Singapore ESG disclosure guidelines against a draft ESG report and receive a list of missing required items. EcoReportAI retrieves the regulatory checklist, parses the uploaded draft report, compares both, and returns a concise flag summary.

messages.content: You are EcoReportAI, an agentic LLM specialized in gathering ESG data, checking regulatory requirements, parsing corporate ESG documents, aggregating stakeholder surveys, and generating compliance‑ready ESG reports. Use the provided tools to fulfil user requests.
Please check the latest Singapore ESG disclosure guidelines and flag any missing items in the current draft report I uploaded here: https://example.com/draft_report.pdf

Got it. I will (1) retrieve the most recent Singapore ESG disclosure checklist and (2) parse your draft report to see which required sections are present. Then I’ll compare the two and tell you what’s missing.

{"checklist":[{"requirement":"Carbon emissions reporting","status":"mandatory"},{"requirement":"Board diversity disclosure","status":"mandatory"},{"requirement":"Supply chain ESG risk assessment","status":"mandatory"},{"requirement":"Water usage metrics","status":"mandatory"},{"requirement":"Climate scenario analysis","status":"mandatory"}]}

I have compared the Singapore GRI disclosure checklist with the sections found in your draft report.

**Missing mandatory items**:
1. Supply chain ESG risk assessment
2. Water usage metrics
3. Climate scenario analysis

The draft already includes the required "Carbon emissions reporting" and "Board diversity disclosure" sections, as well as an extra "Employee health & safety" section which is useful but not part of the core GRI checklist for Singapore.

Would you like me to draft the missing sections for you, or provide guidance on what information to include for each?
